item.description:
Special guest speaker Matt Westfall from New England Brewing will walk you through a sampling of domestic and imported specialty beers that will blow your palate away.  This is not your grandfather's beer tasting!  And then we'll pair off the beers with an array of cheeses and wines to demonstrate how well beer accompanies food compared to wine.  But you can be the judge. 
Call Chris at the store for tickets, $30 per person, at 203.468.7494.  100% of the proceeds will go to St. Bernadette School in New Haven.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: BEER vs. CHEESE vs. WINE " SHOWDOWN:"
